name: brainet = math(cyber, neuro, quantum, chaos)
body:
Hey, this is TZbits01, a **high dimensional** citizen *(I’m reduction-free!)* in `universe(lambda)`, exploring universal Hi-Fi brain network...

Start writing, refining, and reflecting on my inter-disciplinary academic progress...

Mathematics and Logic, Computer Science, (computational and Cognitive focused) Neural Science, Non-linear Systems and Chaos, Quantum Approaches for Computing and Consciousness...

As *Steven Wolfram* says, diversifying researches has profoundly benefited himself, even if there’s only one puzzle to solve, well, I mean scientifically, maybe somehow playfully...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
